description: Replace n by concatenation of its odd divisors >1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a037284 n   | a209229 n == 1 = 0   | otherwise      = read $ concat $ (map show) $ tail $ a182469_row n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 01 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
